alert.note: Alert for White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 2:40PM AKST until January 04 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility expected. Winds gusting to 40 mph. * WHERE...White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Blowing snow will cause low visibility over elevated terrain. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will occur over elevated terrain. The strongest winds are expected to continue through tonight, diminishing Thursday. Valley locations will see winds up to 30 mph and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River
